title: FCC proposes new bureau for space activities
summary: The chairwoman of the Federal Communications Commission announced plans Nov. 3 to reorganize the agency and create a bureau devoted to the its increasing work with space systems.

title: Rocket from Chinese space station module launch predicted to make uncontrolled reentry Nov. 4
summary: The large first stage of the Long March 5B rocket which sent the Mengtian space station module into orbit earlier this week is set for an uncontrolled reentry Friday, Nov. 4.

title: SpaceX launches Hotbird 3G to extend Eutelsat’s broadcast coverage
summary: SpaceX launched the second of two satellites for Eutelsat Nov. 3 to replenish one of the largest broadcast systems in Europe, the Middle East and Northern Africa.

title: Falling Chinese rocket expected to enter Earth’s atmosphere in <2 days
summary: "We hope they will take the reaction to this one into account."

title: Exotrail signs launch agreement with Isar Aerospace
summary: Exotrail, a French company developing orbital transfer vehicles, has signed a contract with German launch vehicle developer Isar Aerospace for multiple launches over the next several years.
